definition[0]: if you renounce an official position, title, right etc, you publicly say that you will not keep it anymore
example[0]: Edward renounced his claim to the French throne.
definition[1]: to publicly say or show that you no longer believe in something, or will no longer behave in a particular way
example[2]: These groups must renounce violence if there is to be progress towards peace.
example[3]: Young people renounced capitalism in favour of peace and love.
